attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that all candidates election for to any public body, ie Parliament or local authority must have his/her main residence within the constituency/ward for which he/she is standing and must have been in that residence for a minimum of five years prior to the election in which he/she is standing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mps and Councillors are supposed to be representatives of the people who elect them.  These days, candidates are too often total strangers picked by the party heirarchies and with no knowledge of or allegience to their constituencies.  This measure would engage local people and eradicate the abuse of "safe seats".
